BENEFITS_DESKTOP_DISCLAIMER: The McLaren Qualified Programme may vary from one country to another and is subject to the McLaren Qualified Programme terms and conditions and any applicable policies. If you wish to receive detailed information about the advantages, eligibility, criteria, and terms & conditions of the McLaren Qualified Programme, please contact your Authorised McLaren Retailer.
BENEFITS_DESKTOP_DISCLAIMER_CERTIFIED: The McLaren Certified Programme may vary from one country to another and is subject to the McLaren Certified Programme terms and conditions and any applicable policies. If you wish to receive detailed information about the advantages, eligibility, criteria, and terms & conditions of the McLaren Certified Programme, please contact your Authorised McLaren Retailer.
BENEFITS_DESKTOP_FINANCIAL_FOOTNOTE: ***Availability of any financial services products is subject to the successful completion of the relevant application process(es) and subject to the applicable terms and conditions.
BENEFITS_DESKTOP_FINANCIAL_PACKAGES: Tailored financial packages available with McLaren Financial Services***
BENEFITS_DESKTOP_GENUINE_PARTS: Only McLaren Genuine Parts are fitted by McLaren trained technicians
BENEFITS_DESKTOP_INSPECTION: A rigorous bodywork and mechanical vehicle inspection to standards designed by McLaren
BENEFITS_DESKTOP_QUALIFIED_WARRANTY: Minimum 12 months McLaren Qualified Warranty, with the option to extend to 24 months*
BENEFITS_DESKTOP_QUALIFIED_WARRANTY_CERT: Minimum 12 months McLaren Certified Warranty, with the option to extend to 24 months*
BENEFITS_DESKTOP_RETAILER_QUALIFIED: Only an Authorised McLaren Retailer can provide all the benefits of the McLaren Qualified Pre-owned Programme.
BENEFITS_DESKTOP_RETAILER_QUALIFIED_CERT: Only an Authorised McLaren Retailer can provide all the benefits of the McLaren Certified Pre-owned Programme.
BENEFITS_DESKTOP_ROADSIDE_ASSISTANCE: Minimum 12 months Roadside Assistance, including onward travel if necessary**
BENEFITS_DESKTOP_ROADSIDE_FOOTNOTE: **Roadside Assistance is not available in all markets and is subject to the terms of the relevant policy.
BENEFITS_DESKTOP_SERVICING_MAINTENANCE: All servicing and maintenance due within 3 months of handover is up to date and complete prior to handover
BENEFITS_DESKTOP_TYRES: All McLaren recommended tyres have at least 3mm of tread
BENEFITS_DESKTOP_VEHICLE_PROVENANCE: All vehicle provenance checks available in the market are carried out by the McLaren Retailer
BENEFITS_DESKTOP_WARRANTY_FOOTNOTE: *Warranty extensions are subject to payment of applicable extended warranty/extended service contract prices.
